Name: Under My Skin
Ingredients: 60 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
10 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: SPRAY glass with absinthe. SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled absinthe misted glass. Special ingredient #1 : Vanilla flavored honey
Review: "I wanted to create a drink that is easy to make using ingredients that are available around the World. The basic inspiration was the classic BACARDÍ Daiquiri, for me one of the best drinks ever invented. The name "Under My Skin" is inspired firstly by the ingredients that, when combined, will get under your skin; secondly by the Frank Sinatra song "Under My Skin" about a woman he can never get enough of. This is the impression I wanted to create with this drink."
History: German BACARDÍ Legacy 2014 winning cocktail created by Frank Thelen, Shepheard, Köln, Germany.
